question:
You eat at your college cafeteria every lunchtime. However, you think it needs some improvements.
Write a letter to the college magazine. In your letter,




explain what you like about the cafeteria 
Say what is wrong with it
Suggest how it could be improved
text: I am writing this letter to express some of my suggestions, which may improve our college cafeteria seating arrangement. I am a student, Utsav, from the A-127 batch, studying Economics. My student ID is 456-RYD.
To begin with, I am fond of the state-of-art facilities offered by the cafeteria, such as smart chairs and tables. In addition to that, I believe, the new wall design is fabulous.

That being said, it came to my notice recently that a lot of students eat while standing in the cafeteria during lunchtime because of improper seating arrangement. As a result of this, many students, including myself, do not enjoy their meals on a regular basis and others eat outside the campus at local restaurants.
In the wake of this problem, I would like you to add ample chairs and tables in the cafeteria that can accommodate students during lunch hours and tea breaks.
I am certain that you would consider my suggestions.

error_list.error_des: It seems that arrangement may not agree in number with other words in this phrase.
